name: Grind Fest Survival
description:
There are zombies, there are guns, and there is YOU!

The objective is simple, survive the incoming hordes of zombies using a variety of guns and upgrades. Beware that your gun's conditions deteriorate the longer you use them, forcing you to unjam or replace them with a newer one!

= CONTROL = Left ClickFire
1, 2, 3Switch WeaponRReloadXSwitch Fire modeESCPause
= TIPS =

- Press Reload at the right timing to Reload FASTER

- Aim at the head to do more damage

- LOW CONDITION GUNS JAM MORE OFTEN

- KEEP KILLING TO EARN NEW GUNS

= DISCLAIMER =

This project is developed by me as a university project at Thammasat University, major in Game Art and Design (IDD-CDT).

I do not own any sound effects used in this game.
